Samuel wrote:
> Hi all,
>
> Does anyone know how can I retrieve the original seed URI from the
> current CrawlURI (which is not always the base uri, as they got
> somehow redirected to completely diferent URIs)? I get the CURI object
> from the innerProcess method o a Writer Processor.
Its not possible currently.  We've been talking about adding this 
feature with a while (There's an RFE here: 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1119608&group_id=73833&atid=539102).

Until then, your only recourse is analysis of the crawl.log.  Checkout 
the hoppath.pl script under $HERITRIX_HOME/bin.

Yours,
St.Ack
>
> Thanks
